main(String[]) - Static method in class a2.Waltz

makeMinuet(String) - Static method in class a2.Waltz
Returns an array of length MINUET_SEQUENCE_LENGTH where each element is the name of a randomly chosen minuet musical fragment for the specified instrument.
makeRandomMinuet() - Static method in class a2.Waltz
Returns an array of length MINUET_SEQUENCE_LENGTH where each element is the name of a randomly chosen minuet musical fragment played by a randomly chosen instrument.
makeRandomTrio() - Static method in class a2.Waltz
Returns an array of length TRIO_SEQUENCE_LENGTH where each element is the name of a randomly chosen trioi musical fragment played by a randomly chosen instrument.
makeTrio(String) - Static method in class a2.Waltz
Returns an array of length TRIO_SEQUENCE_LENGTH where each element is the name of a randomly chosen trioi musical fragment for the specified instrument.
mapConsonant(String) - Static method in class a2.HawaiianWords
Returns the English-sounding pronunciation of the consonant stored in s.
MappingResult - Class in a2
Stores the result of attempting to map a character or characters from a Hawaiian word to its English pronunciation.
MappingResult() - Constructor for class a2.MappingResult
Initializes a mapping result so that value is equal to null and charsConsumed is equal to 0.
mapUnconsumed(String, int) - Static method in class a2.HawaiianWords
Computes the pronunciation mapping of the character located at index in the string word.
mapVowel(String) - Static method in class a2.HawaiianWords
Returns the English-sounding pronunciation of the vowel or vowel pair stored in s.
mightBeValid(String) - Static method in class a2.HawaiianWords
Returns true if and only if the string word is made up of only space characters, Hawaiian vowels, and Hawaiian consonants.
MINUET_SEQUENCE_LENGTH - Static variable in class a2.Waltz
The number of precomposed musical fragments making up a minuet sequence.
